thread.title: CheapOair Announces Inaugural CheapOair Owards Finalists
thread.title_full: CheapOair Announces Inaugural CheapOair Owards Finalists

title: CheapOair Announces Inaugural CheapOair Owards Finalists
text: Email This Story Printer Friendly PDF Version RSS Feed CheapOair Announces Inaugural CheapOair Owards Finalists CheapOair taps consumers to vote for the Most Effortless, Most Affordable And Most Enjoyable City of the Year on CheapOair.com/Owards. NEW YORK, NY, August 14,   CheapOair, a leading hybrid (online/traditional) travel agency, announced today the finalist cities for the inaugural CheapOair Owards, an awards program that celebrates American cities that best embody CheapOair's overall mission and vision of making travel effortless, affordable and enjoyable. The finalists were chosen by a panel of internal travel experts with centuries of collective travel and travel booking experience, which included CheapOair's travel agents, executive team and the brand's CEO and founder, Sam Jain. "CheapOair strives to make booking travel an effortless, affordable and enjoyable experience for customers, and we feel that each finalist city chosen embodies that very vision," said Jain. "Determining each finalist was not a simple task among hundreds of exciting and accessible American cities, but I am thrilled about these finalists and look forward to the consumer voting and results." Residents and fans of the finalist cities can vote for their favorite city in each category by visiting http://www.CheapOair.com/Owards starting today until Saturday, October 12, 2015. The city that receives the most votes in each category will receive the CheapOair Gold Oward during the inaugural Owards celebration on Wednesday, October 20, 2015 in New York City. The finalists in the three categories include: Most Effortless City of the Year: Berkeley, CA
